item.title: Jo add a quote by Flannery O' Connor
item.description: "Where you come from is gone, where you thought you were going to never was there, and where you are is no good unless you can get away from it" -- Flannery O' Connor

item.title: Jo add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "If you expect nothing from anybody, youâ€™re never disappointed." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Jo add a quote by Arthur C. Clarke
item.description: "Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic." -- Arthur C. Clarke

item.title: Jo add a quote by Flannery O'Connor
item.description: "You shall know the truth and the truth shall make you odd." -- Flannery O'Connor

item.title: Jo add a quote by Robert Rankin
item.description: "Science,' said Mr Anders Anders. 'Science, not magic. I told you before: when things are not as they appear to be, it's because they're actually simpler than you think them to be. Things are never as difficult and complicated as folk believe. You'd be surprised just how straightforward and obvious things really are. The secret is in knowing how to look at them the right way." -- Robert Rankin

item.title: Jo add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "If you wear a short enough skirt, the party will come to you." -- Dorothy Parker
